body:
No fair removing the very needed and useful romanji subtitles.
Cuz if you think for a sec that im gonna learn how to read your encrypted artsy traditional scribs your in 4 a seriously sad disappointment.
Heck you asians cant even agree to each other so why should us westerners?
Its mandarin here and cantonese there.
Its katakana one moment then hiragana the next.
Heck you even write backwards in relation to us and sometimes upside down or crossways.
Nuts!
